title: Pea and carrot soup
ingredients: ['3 large carrots, sliced', '750ml vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 stick celery, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped', '700g frozen peas, thawed', '2 teaspoons maple syrup', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 tablespoons creme fraiche']
